game.name: Firefly Village
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Firefly Village awaits! A bite-sized, streamlined farming sim that focuses on moments that matter, without wasting a single second of your time. Build a homestead, raise crops, tend to livestock, make friends, and enjoy a pocket of paradise where farming is a delight and friends plentiful.
